rules_text:
Whenever this Subroutine runs, choose one – 
• Create Noop, a legendary 3/3 colorless Construct artifact creature token with defender.
• Target Construct loses defender and becomes a 5/5 Avatar in addition to its other types.
• Put a number of +1/+1 counters on target Avatar equal to its power. It gains trample.
notes:
!tokens Program A ERR;Program B ERR;Program C ERR;Noop ERR
